name: OR_LOG_HANDOFFS
description: This table stores information on the patient handoffs associated with a log.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HNDOFF_FRM_STAFF_ID
columns.description: Documents the staff giving the handoff.

columns.name: HANDOFF_TO_STAFF_ID
columns.description: Documents the staff receiving the handoff.

columns.name: HANDOFF_DATE
columns.description: Documents the date of the handoff.

columns.name: HANDOFF_TIME
columns.description: Documents the time of the handoff.

columns.name: HANDOFF_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the handoff status.

columns.name: HANDOFF_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the handoff method.

columns.name: HANDOFF_COMMENTS
columns.description: This item stores any comments related to this handoff.
